mapper.select: select phone from membertable where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update membertable set pwd = #{pwd}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, addr = #{addr}, therapy1 = #{ therapy1 }, therapy2 = #{ therapy2 }, therapy3 = #{ therapy3 }, part = #{ part } where id = #{ id }
mapper.select: select * from membertable where id in (select id from role where role_name = 'ROLE_PKEMPLOYEE')
select * from membertable where id in (select id from role where role_name = 'ROLE_PKUSER')
select * from membertable where id = #{ id }
mapper.insert: insert into membertable (id, pwd, name, email, phone, gender, birth, addr, therapy1, therapy2, therapy3, part, mem_date) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{addr}, #{ therapy1 }, #{ therapy2 }, #{ therapy3 }, #{ part }, sysdate)
mapper.select: select memberid,memberconsult,resertype,consulttype,categoryprice,appointday from ( select memberid,memberconsult,resertype,consulttype,categoryprice, to_char(appointday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as appointday from reservation) where appointday like #{param1}||'%' order by appointday desc

select memberid,memberconsult,resertype,consulttype,categoryprice,appointday from ( select memberid,memberconsult,resertype,consulttype,categoryprice, to_char(appointday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as appointday from reservation) where appointday like #{param1}||'-'||#{param2}||'%' order by appointday desc

select m.currentday, m.name as memname, e.name as empname, m.appointday, m.appointweek, floor(m.appointtime/100) as ahour, floor(m.appointtime-(m.appointtime/100)*100) as aminute, m.consulttype, m.resertype, m.memberconsult, m.patron, m.categoryprice from (select m.name, r.* from membertable m join reservation r on m.ID = r.MEMBERID) m JOIN (select m.name, r.* from membertable m join reservation r on m.ID = r.EMPLOYEEID) e on m.num = e.num where m.appointday = #{appointday}
